channel.title: [z508] changing ::lvl XP?
channel.description: hi, i downloaded z508 source. if u do ::lvl u only get 1m xp to spend. how do i change that? ive been looking all day to find it, and this is my last resort. please help me.

item.title: [z508] changing ::lvl XP?
item.dc:creator: @igly igly
item.description:
@igly wrote:

u have to go in src>net>com>model then at the bottom theres a notpad called player, go in that and do ctrl+F and search this:

public int spendingExperience = 1000000
change the 1000000 to whatever u want =]

Read full topic
